attributes.action: Make the government invest more into reducing emissions&stopping climate change.
attributes.background: I want the government to invest more as soon, if we don't act, all the islands will have sunk because of sea levels rising, and that includes the UK. I want the government to invest more so we don't have to vacate to Mars and I don't want this to happen.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Set more ambitious emissions reduction targets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647923

Increase funding to help tackle climate change: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654662
